text: Hazrat Sain (Saint) Sachal Sarmast (1730-1829), whose real name was Abdul Wahab Faruqi, was a famous mystic poet and Sufi of Sindh (now in Pakistan). Sachal was a person who loved God and wrote beautiful poems about this special love of his.Abdul Majeed Bhurgri, 'Sachal's Verse' (trans from Sindhi language) 1972 He spent most of his life teaching that all human beings, of all religions and colours and groups etc, are bound together by the Divine Love.Agha S Muhammad, 'Sachal jo Risalo' (Sindhi:Sachal's Life and Works) Hyderabad, Sindh, Pakistan, 1988 His shrine is at Daraza village, Ranipur, close to Khairpur, Pakistan.Agha ==References== Category:1730 births Category:1829 deaths Category:Asian Sufis Category:Mystics Category:Poets from Sindh
